page.title: 01BRINGTON/CATWORTH/LEIGHTON
page.content:
Mostly rural area, scattered villages on main routes E/W A45 (Cambridge/Nor- thampton), A604 (Huntingdon/Kettering) - due to become A1/M1 link - N/S B660 (Peterborough/Bedford). Key village Kimbolton on A45, 3 miles to S, for shops + surgery, Molesworth proposed Cruise missile base immediately to N.
Now in Cambridgeshire (pre 1974 in Hun tingdonshire) survey area borders Bed- fordshire and Northamptonshire. Good mix of age groups from babies to 100+. Varied house styles with occasional thatched cottages is result of little new development being allowed.
Many families stay for few years only for schooling, employment or to be near older relatives.
